changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.location_relationship ( id bigserial NOT NULL, relationship bigint NOT NULL, target_context bigint NOT NULL, product_mapped_value bigint NOT NULL, sequence_number integer NOT NULL, location_1_attribute bigint NOT NULL, attribute_relationship bigint NOT NULL, location_2_attribute bigint NOT NULL, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, notes character varying, research bigint, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT location_relationship_attribute_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (attribute_relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_product_mapped_value_fkey FOREIGN KEY (product_mapped_value) REFERENCES ruleform.product (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_location_1_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location_1_attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_location_2_attribute_fkey FOREIGN KEY (location_2_attribute) REFERENCES ruleform.attribute (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_relationship_fkey FOREIGN KEY (relationship) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT location_relationship_context_key UNIQUE (relationship, product_mapped_value , sequence_number ), CONSTRAINT location_relationship_sequence_number_check CHECK (sequence_number > 0) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
